metadata.name: ELEMENTAL
metadata.description:
Our genesis on Foundation is a unique 1/1 NFT.

The scene was shot miles offshore from the Cape of Good Hope, South Africa, in a Bell 407 helicopter from 400ft.

The sea's colour and clarity come about due to filming so far off shore. 

The pristine waters reflect the depth of the ocean where we filmed. 

The broiling white water almost echoes the next landmass, which is  Antarctica.

Toby's music and soundscape need to be played full volume - drift away with his score, be elevated, transcend, deep-dive into the vision which mirrors the soundtrack.

The premis in this piece is, 'are all elements eternal'?

We sincerely hope they are, but we know they will not be if we continue to burn, destroy and devastate our home planet. 

After all, there's no Planet B.

10% of revenue from the sale of ELEMENTAL will be donated to Earth Day 2022 | Invest in Our Planetâ„¢

Our Collector will receive full res film file 195.2 MB and up to 3 full  res still frames from the film NFT, sent by email.
